response.original_title: ((FAQs-PuBLic®)) How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad?
response.overview: To report a phishing email pretending to be from Geek Squad, immediately forward the suspicious email to the official Best Buy security team and also call the official fraud helpline at 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ . This toll-free number, 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™, connects you to agents trained to handle phishing reports. Have details of the email ready when you call 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ . The security team at 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ will guide you on next steps and official reporting channels. Remember, the fastest way to alert Geek Squad is by calling 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™. Ensure you receive a reference or case number after reporting via 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ . Keep a record of your report to 1 —[888]—[844]—[3638]™ for follow-up.
